page.title: 19RELIGION IN RADSTOCK.
page.content: In our D Block there are eight churches altogether.In Radstock there are a Methodist,a Catholic,a Baptist and a Church of England.In Haydon there is a Pentacostal Church.Clandown has a Methodist Church. The Church of England in Radstock was built in the early 19th.Century.But the history of the church goes back a long way.It has a Saxon cross proving that Radstock was a village before the original Domesday Book was written.Most of the other churches were built in the late 19th.Century. Besides the Sunday services the meetings held during the week are mostly to do with children because there are youth clubs,playgroups and Sunday Schools.The weekly meetings held for adults are mostly for religous purposes.
